about_the_game:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the CPT Premier Package. Includes the following content: Chun-Li CPT Costume, Cammy CPT Costume, Necalli's CPT Champions Choice costume, Ring of Destiny stage, EX2 colors for 22 characters (all sixteen launch characters and the six 2016 DLC characters), and special in-game titles 'Capcom Cup 2016' and 'Capcom Pro Tour 2016'.

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*The EX02 colors and in-game titles are limited content only available in the CPT: 2016 Pack. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.
detailed_description:
Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the CPT Premier Package. Includes the following content: Chun-Li CPT Costume, Cammy CPT Costume, Necalli's CPT Champions Choice costume, Ring of Destiny stage, EX2 colors for 22 characters (all sixteen launch characters and the six 2016 DLC characters), and special in-game titles 'Capcom Cup 2016' and 'Capcom Pro Tour 2016'.

*The costumes and stage included in this bundle can be purchased individually. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
*The EX02 colors and in-game titles are limited content only available in the CPT: 2016 Pack. These contents are not available for purchase individually.
*In order to use this content, it is required to have the base game which is sold separately. Also, please make sure to update when it is required to apply the latest patch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, GTX 570, GTX 670, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with XInput and DirectInput USB devices including gamepads and arcade sticks based on Xbox 360, Xbox One, and DualShock controllers. Steam Controller also supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @3.50GHz or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with XInput and DirectInput USB devices including gamepads and arcade sticks based on Xbox 360, Xbox One, and DualShock controllers. Steam Controller also supported.
